titles.title: A bill for the relief of Stanley C. Bourassa and Katherine V. Bourassa.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 1/7/1987--Introduced. Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to two named individuals in full settlement of all claims against the United States arising from the submersion of land allotted to one of those individuals.
